Our key objective is to add value in every area of collaboration with our clients. Beckley Consulting Limited (BCL) has its registered office in Lagos. The Company has assembled a team of experienced and energetic professionals and partners who are experts in various fields to provide effective, reliable and cutting edge services to meet and exceed the expectations of our clients. The management and staff of the Company have the requisite expertise and experience to deliver value added solutions to meet the needs of clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Representative
Job Location: Ogba, Lagos
Job Type: Shift Work (Including Morning and Night Shifts)

Job Summary


	We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Human Resources Representative to provide day-to-day HR support and ensure smooth workforce management.
	The HR Representative will serve as the first point of contact for employees, manage HR operations, and ensure compliance with labour regulations and company policies.


Key Responsibilities


	Act as the HR contact for employees, addressing inquiries and resolving HR issues
	Support recruitment and onboarding processes
	Maintain accurate employee records and HR databases
	Administer leave, benefits, and performance management activities
	Handle employee relations, grievances, and disciplinary matters
	Ensure compliance with labour laws and statutory requirements (e.g., PAYE, pensions, HMO)
	Support employee engagement initiatives and HR reporting activities
	Perform other HR-related tasks as assigned by management.


Requirements


	B.Sc./HND in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related discipline
	1 – 2 years of HR experience (experience in outsourcing/consulting is an added advantage)
	Good knowledge of Nigerian labour laws and HR best practices
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Proficiency in MS Office and HR software tools
	Must be professional, confidential, and detail-oriented
	Must reside in Ogba or nearby areas for ease of commute.


Remuneration
Attractive Salary

Method of Application
